exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma MD : Model kMD : KripkeModel MD M : Kmodel R : Relation (Kworlds M) SM : Semantics L MD cP : context -> Prop rel : bijection (Kworlds M) {x : context | cP x} H_R : forall (m n : Kworlds M) (Phi Psi : {x : context | cP x}), rel m Phi -> rel n Psi -> m <= n <-> Included expr (proj1_sig Phi) (proj1_sig Psi) x : Kworlds M The term "rel x" has type "{x : context | cP x} -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "{x : context | cP x}".

ctx: intros x y z Hxy Hyz.
exceptions.tactic: specialize (H_R x y (rel x) (rel y)) as [H1 H2].
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma MD : Model kMD : KripkeModel MD M : Kmodel R : Relation (Kworlds M) SM : Semantics L MD cP : context -> Prop rel : bijection (Kworlds M) {x : context | cP x} H_R : forall (m n : Kworlds M) (Phi Psi : {x : context | cP x}), rel m Phi -> rel n Psi -> m <= n <-> Included expr (proj1_sig Phi) (proj1_sig Psi) x, y, z : Kworlds M Hxy : x <= y Hyz : y <= z The term "rel x" has type "{x : context | cP x} -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "{x : context | cP x}".

ctx: intros x y z Hxy Hyz.
exceptions.tactic: specialize (H_R y z (rel y) (rel z)) as [H3 H4].
exceptions.exn: The reference H_R was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros x y z Hxy Hyz.
exceptions.exn: The reference H3 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros x y z Hxy Hyz.
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language Gamma : Derivable L MD : Model kMD : KripkeModel MD M : Kmodel R : Relation (Kworlds M) cP : context -> Prop rel : bijection (Kworlds M) {x : context | cP x} x, y, z : Kworlds M Hxy : x <= y Hyz : y <= z H : forall (m n : Kworlds M) (Phi Psi : {x : context | cP x}), rel m Phi -> rel n Psi -> Included expr (proj1_sig Phi) (proj1_sig Psi) -> m <= n H0 : forall (m n : Kworlds M) (Phi Psi : {x : context | cP x}), rel m Phi -> rel n Psi -> m <= n -> Included expr (proj1_sig Phi) (proj1_sig Psi) denotation : expr -> model -> Prop deduction_weaken : forall (Phi Psi : Ensemble expr) (x : expr), Included expr Phi Psi -> Phi |-- x -> Psi |-- x derivable_assum : forall (Phi : Ensemble expr) (x : expr), Ensembles.In expr Phi x -> Phi |-- x deduction_subst : forall (Phi Psi : context) (y : expr), (forall x : expr, Psi x -> Phi |-- x) -> Union expr Phi Psi |-- y -> Phi |-- y Unable to unify "x <= y" with "Ensembles.In (Kworlds M) (R x) z".

ctx: intros x y z Hxy Hyz.
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language Gamma : Derivable L MD : Model kMD : KripkeModel MD M : Kmodel R : Relation (Kworlds M) cP : context -> Prop rel : bijection (Kworlds M) {x : context | cP x} x, y, z : Kworlds M Hxy : x <= y Hyz : y <= z H : forall (m n : Kworlds M) (Phi Psi : {x : context | cP x}), rel m Phi -> rel n Psi -> Included expr (proj1_sig Phi) (proj1_sig Psi) -> m <= n H0 : forall (m n : Kworlds M) (Phi Psi : {x : context | cP x}), rel m Phi -> rel n Psi -> m <= n -> Included expr (proj1_sig Phi) (proj1_sig Psi) denotation : expr -> model -> Prop deduction_weaken : forall (Phi Psi : Ensemble expr) (x : expr), Included expr Phi Psi -> Phi |-- x -> Psi |-- x derivable_assum : forall (Phi : Ensemble expr) (x : expr), Ensembles.In expr Phi x -> Phi |-- x deduction_subst : forall (Phi Psi : context) (y : expr), (forall x : expr, Psi x -> Phi |-- x) -> Union expr Phi Psi |-- y -> Phi |-- y Unable to unify "y <= z" with "Ensembles.In (Kworlds M) (R x) z".

original: split. - intros x. specialize (H_R x x (rel x) (rel x)). apply H_R. reflexivity. - intros x y z Hxy Hyz. specialize (H_R x y (rel x) (rel y)) as [H1 H2]. specialize (H_R y z (rel y) (rel z)) as [H3 H4]. apply H3. apply Hxy. apply Hyz.
